abstract.text: Gathers the elements of a tensor along a single axis.

inlineContent.text: Use BNNSGraph* APIs

inlineContent.text: The axis along which the operation gathers the indices.
A pointer to the input descriptor.
A pointer to the indices descriptor.
A pointer to the output descriptor.
The filter runtime parameters.
Use
to gather elements — that you specify by index — into an output tensor.
In the simplest case, use
to gather elements from a 1D vector with indices defined as a 1D vector. The following code gathers the four elements at indices
On return,
contains the values

supports gathering from a tensor with two or more dimensions using indices defined as a 1D vector. In this case, the indices correspond to the values along an entire axis and the input and output shapes must match.
The following code generates a 3 x 4 matrix from the rows of a 3 x 3 matrix:
On return,
contains the following values:
The function returns an error if any of the indices are out of range.
